dataTemplate.name: XXAPUIAE
dataTemplate.description: OD: AP UI Action Errors Report

dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT * FROM xx_ap_uiaction_errors WHERE last_update_date BETWEEN to_date(NVL(:p_date,to_char(sysdate))||' 00:00:00','DD-MON-RR HH24:MI:SS') AND to_date(NVL(:p_date,to_char(sysdate))||' 23:59:59','DD-MON-RR HH24:MI:SS') ORDER BY invoice_id
